about.jobDescription: In this role, I develop CI/CD pipelines and Grafana observability tools, combining my passion for automation with practical business applications.
about.exploring: , I'm constantly exploring new technologies and approaches to solving complex problems. I believe in writing maintainable code and creating intuitive user experiences.
about.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies and experimenting with AI and machine learning concepts. For a refreshing break, you'll often find me recharging on the badminton court or at the gym, staying active and energized.
